amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace title I, the Fatherhood Grant Program, with language establishing the Parents Count Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 1 printed in H. Rept. 106-463 to strike Title I, Fatherhood Grant Program and replace with the Parents Count Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mink amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 253 (Roll no. 583).
